content: add to your toy collection or give the perfect gift with this cushy crochet rabbit stitched in thick and plush bernat blanket crochet a rabbit pal by doing single_crochet increases decreases and sewing techniques give your rabbit any color personality you like it s a great way to stimulate imaginative playtime so surprise that special child on your list materials super bulky 6 bernat® blanket™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m bernat® blanket brights™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m gold 10970 or bright pink 12042 or light teal 10734 2 balls or 420 yds/384 m measurement approx 18 45 5 cm tall excluding legs
